body_html:
same problem with tf 1.10.0. It seems that hooks under distributed training will become PerDevice, but desired is tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook. Hope it can be fixed soon.

TypeError: All hooks must be SessionRunHook instances, given: PerDevice:{'/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0': <tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook object at 0x7ff1371e5350>, '/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:1': <tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook object at 0x7ff290043850>}

same problem with tf 1.10.0. It seems that hooks under distributed training will become PerDevice, but desired is tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook. Hope it can be fixed soon.
TypeError: All hooks must be SessionRunHook instances, given: PerDevice:{'/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0': <tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook object at 0x7ff1371e5350>, '/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:1': <tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook object at 0x7ff290043850>}
body:
same problem with tf 1.10.0. It seems that hooks under distributed training will become `PerDevice`, but desired is `tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook`. Hope it can be fixed soon. 
```
TypeError: All hooks must be SessionRunHook instances, given: PerDevice:{'/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:0': <tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook object at 0x7ff1371e5350>, '/replica:0/task:0/device:GPU:1': <tensorflow.python.training.basic_session_run_hooks.LoggingTensorHook object at 0x7ff290043850>}

```
